DOC.brief_summary: Fibromyalgia complex chronic illness affect 6-12 million Americans . Self-management strategy play key role reduce symptom maintain functioning . The propose project offer web-based self management tool enable FM sufferer identify significant linkage personal symptom level personal self-management effort time order plan optimal approach disease management .
DOC.detailed_description: This Phase II project complete development SMART ( Self-Monitoring Review Tool ) Log program symptom management health promotion FM evaluate efficacy large web-based trial closely emulate plan application Phase III . The SMARTLog program interactive web-based self-monitoring feedback intervention employ proprietary statistical analysis procedure give user personally optimized guidance behavioral , lifestyle cop strategy yield effective symptom reduction individual . The program incorporate longitudinal collection analysis individual 's self-monitoring data follow delivery personalize feedback derive personal data . The program help FM sufferer discover monitor linkage specific personal health-related behavior management strategy symptom level time . Feasibility demonstrate Phase I high retention rate , rating satisfaction perceive relevance , evidence impact utilization improve well-being use period , qualitative data indicate strong interest continuation program .
